title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description:
Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work. Description: Color orange doesn't work. Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set color or background color to orange.
OB: When setting the color or background color to orange in a report item, the expected result is that the color appears as orange.
EB: However, the actual result is that the color does not appear as orange.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
